operation: Search for Items in the Drive
operationSummary: Search for Items in the Drive
operationDescription: This method allows your app to track changes to a drive and its children over time.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The query text used to search for items. Values may be matched across several fields including filename, metadata, and file content.
